name: Global Hunger Index (IFPRI 2017)
title: Global Hunger Index (IFPRI 2017)
description: GHI is a composite index that combines data on prevalence of undernourishment, child stunting, child wasting and child mortality.

sources.name: International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI); Welthungerhilfe (WHH); Concern Worldwide, 2017, "2017 Global Hunger Index Data"
sources.dataPublisherSource: UN, UNICEF, WHO, FAO data on undernourishment, child malnutrition and mortality
sources.additionalInfo: GHI is a composite index that combines data on prevalence of undernourishment, child stunting, child wasting and child mortality.
